scenario_text.value: All right, let’s get moving again.
What? Already?! But we just stopped.
You had long enough.

Besides, we can’t be wastin’ time here when
we still got such a long way to go.

Kaito’s right. At this rate, next thing you
know the sun will be down.

Plus that fog could come rollin’ in at any
time.

(That’s true. We really shouldn’t stop for
much longer than this.)
(But has everyone gotten enough rest?)

(Saki, Miyuki, and Lopmon all seemed pretty
exhausted.)
(I think I’m most worried about...)
Saki
Miyuki
Lopmon
Saki

(Saki wasn’t looking so great when we
stopped. I’m most concerned about her.)

Hm? Takuma, is something wrong? Why’re you
staring at me?
Uh, no reason...

Wait, is this because you’re worried about
me?
Well, don’t be! I’m all rested up now.

Yeah, we both got a nice chance to relax and
take in the view!
(She does look like she’s feeling better.)
(I guess she’s good to go.)
Miyuki
(I’m concerned about Miyuki.)

(She’s always so quiet, and she’s sleepy all
the time. Maybe this is too much for her.)

Miyuki, Haru, how are you feeling? All rested
up and ready to get moving again?
I’m fine.
Fine...

All right, then. But let us know if things
start to get too hard, okay?
Then I’ll let you ride on my back!

(Seems like Aoi and Labramon are looking out
for them, so they should be fine.)
Lopmon

(Lopmon said his legs were sore, and I think
I saw tears in his eyes. That concerns me.)
Lopmon, are your legs feeling better?
Yeah... I can walk fine now.
Shuuji, I swear I’ll keep up this time.

Sure, that’s the least you could do. I don’t
see why you’re telling me about it.

Grr... Why does Shuuji always have to be so
mean?

It is proof that he has but little room in
his heart. Lopmon, do not be dismayed.
Right... I’ll be okay.

(Well, Shuuji’s as demanding as ever, but it
does look like we can get moving.)

Everyone seems to be feeling better, Shuuji.
Kaito’s right, we should get moving.

Yeah, who knows what could happen to Miu if
we waste too much time?
You don’t have to tell me that.
Let’s go, everyone!
